questions.minister: Minister of infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that the Zambezi - Chitokoloki road in Zambezi East Parliamentary Constituency, is in a deplorable state, thereby posing a great risk to the lives of patients being referred from Zambezi District Hospital to Chitokoloki Mission Hospital; and
(b) if so, what urgent measures are being taken to rehabilitate the road to avoid it becoming impassable in the rainy season.
